results.title: Simvastatin and eugenol restore autophagic flux and alleviate oxidative, inflammatory, and fibrotic perturbations in an arginine-induced chronic pancreatitis rat model.
results.text_hl: Altogether, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Eugenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005054 @@@eugenol@@@ provide a promising interventional approach for @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050500 @@@CP@@@, at least partly, by restoring the impaired autophagic flux associated with @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050500 @@@CP@@@.
